tables.create_images:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS images (
    name    TEXT,           -- Display name
    path    TEXT not null,  -- Search path
    file    TEXT not null,  -- Base file
    source  TEXT,           -- Source path
    exif    TEXT,           -- EXIF as JSON
    iptc    TEXT,           -- IPTC as JSON
    thumb   TEXT,         -- Thumb Base64 encoded
    display TEXT,         -- Display Base64 encoded
    PRIMARY KEY (source,file)
);
tables.create_search:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS search
(
    search_id   TEXT NOT NULL
,   recno       NUMERIC NOT NULL
,   entry       TEXT NOT NULL
,   key         TEXT
);
tables.create_wordclouds:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wordclouds (
    cloudname   TEXT NOT NULL,
    key         TEXT NOT NULL,
    entry       TEXT NOT NULL,
    count       TEXT NOT NULL,
    tag         TEXT NOT NULL,
    norm        TEXT NOT NULL
);

sql.insert_files: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO %s( source, path, file, name ) VALUES( '%s','%s','%s','%s' );
sql.insert_search: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO search( search_id, recno, entry, key ) VALUES( '%s','%s','%s','%s' );
sql.replace_into_images: REPLACE INTO images( path, file, thumb, display, source ) VALUES( '%s', '%s', '%s', '%s', '%s');
REPLACE INTO images( path, file, thumb, display, source ) VALUES( '%s', '%s', '%s', '%s', '%s');
sql.replace_into_dirs: REPLACE INTO dirs( path ) SELECT DISTINCT path FROM images ORDER BY path DESC ;
sql.update_dirs: UPDATE dirs SET thumb = ( SELECT thumb FROM images WHERE path LIKE dirs.path ORDER BY path DESC, FILE DESC LIMIT 1 );
sql.replace_into_images:
UPDATE images
SET thumb = '%s',
display = '%s'
WHERE source like '%s'
AND
file like '%s';
sql.replace_into_meta:
UPDATE images
SET exif = '%s',
iptc = '%s'
WHERE source like '%s'
AND
file like '%s';
sql.select_files_count: SELECT count(*) as no_of_images FROM images;
sql.select_files_resume_count: SELECT count(*) FROM images WHERE thumb IS NULL OR display IS NULL OR exif IS NULL OR iptc IS NULL;
sql.select_files_resume: SELECT path||'/'||file as files FROM images WHERE thumb IS NULL OR display IS NULL OR exif IS NULL OR iptc IS NULL;
sql.select_path: SELECT DISTINCT path FROM images WHERE path glob '%s*';
sql.select_source_meta: SELECT rowid, source||'/'||file as file, exif, iptc FROM images;
sql.select_path_file: SELECT path, file FROM images WHERE path LIKE '%s';
sql.select_all_files: SELECT source||'/'||file as files FROM images;
sql.select_thumb: SELECT name, path, file, thumb, exif, iptc FROM IMAGES WHERE path like '%s' ORDER BY path DESC, file DESC
sql.select_display: SELECT path, file, display FROM IMAGES WHERE path = '%s' AND file = '%s'
sql.select_meta: SELECT exif, iptc FROM images WHERE file = '%s' AND path = '%s'
sql.newest_picture_in_path: SELECT * FROM images WHERE path LIKE '%s%%' ORDER BY path DESC, file DESC LIMIT 1;
sql.oldest_picture_in_path: SELECT * FROM images WHERE path LIKE '%s%%' ORDER BY path ASC, file ASC LIMIT 1;
sql.thumb_from_dirs: SELECT path, thumb FROM dirs WHERE path IN ( '%s' ) ;
